storyInfo: Matterhorn decides to discard his badly-damaged shield, but Vulcan has other ideas.

attributes.content: Vulcan!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: *sniff* *sniff*
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: I smell honey biscuits!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Yes, I just baked some.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Wow!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: One for Vulcan, one for me! One for Matterhorn, one for me! One for Lava, one for me...
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: Here's another batch of weapons that need repairs, Vulcan.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: Go play by yourself for a while, Kay. I have some work to get to.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Ceobe

attributes.content: We've taken care of the ones that just need honing or oiling, but there are a few that are above our pay grade.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: Alright, I'll take a look at them.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: It's been disassembled. Everything's here: Originium circuit, crossbow frame, and other miscellaneous parts.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: Regular maintenance and testing are complete; the hard part's with a modification.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: The user is a sniper, but he wants to add a built-in shield.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: Like the round shield I designed? It only protects the user, but it's portable and can be carried on the belt.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: The integrated Originium circuit can boost the user's Arts, or even be used as a weapon itself.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: But adding it to a crossbow adds dead weight while compromising integrity. That's why I was thinking about rejecting the application.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: Don't worry, leave it to me.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: The recently developed elastic parts, as well as the ultra-thin ones developed by Blemishine, may come in useful.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: We'll leave it to you then.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: There's a lot to do today...
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: We have a bunch of weapons coming in for repair and maintenance.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: Looks like they went through the grinder out there.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Look at this crack. The user would've been severely injured without the shield there. See how many arrowheads got caught in it?
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Here's Operator Matterhorn's shield too.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: Talk about a deep crack... was he trying to dig a tunnel with it?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: Seems like it'll need to be replaced sooner rather than later.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I'll disassemble it. Check the integrity of the individual parts.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Is something the matter?
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Oh, n-no, it's just that this is my first chance to work with you, so I'm a bit nervous...
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: The veterans of the Engineering Department talk about you a lot. I'll do my best!
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: Well, good luck.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I'll find some steel.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Hibiscus's staff, Fang's lance, Beagle's shield, Kroos's crossbow...
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Their weapons have a tendency to take a beating.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: These are what they used when they first came to Rhodes Island. These are the ones that I've modified. Can you tell the difference?
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Rhodes Island operators have to work in a variety of environments, which demands a high degree of versatility from their equipment.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Understood!
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: It's also important to take into account each operator's personality and individual needs. The craftsman's intentions must never supplant the user's needs.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Like the accessories that Kroos hangs here?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Many operators are very attached to their weapons, and we must be extremely attentive to this in our work.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: The better we know the user, the better we can fulfill their requests.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Alright, this batch of weapons is done.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: May they serve their operators well.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Excuse me, Vulcan, are you there?
Yes, come in. The door's unlocked.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Hello. I would like to commission a new shield.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: This is the one that I've been using. It's gone through a lot of repairs, and it's getting less and less effective in combat. It's time I replaced it.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: This one? I've worked on it many times.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Yes, I brought it with me from Kjerag.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: It was made with steel that could withstand the extremely low temperatures there.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Away from Kjerag, however, it no longer performs at the same level.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Yes, you mentioned that before, but I didn't want to replace it.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: With the crack from this latest operation, though, I can see that it's reached its limit.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: We ran into a pack of enraged needleflies, and their poisons have seeped into the crack.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: It's going to be difficult to clean out the poison and needlefly pieces in order to repair it.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Even a layman like me can see how complicated it is.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: So... I guess this is the end of the road for this shield; there's no way to get it back to peak form.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Let me see.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Needlefly poisons, and pieces from their mouthparts... definitely a headache.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: The size of the crack has also warped the structure in the back.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: The internal cracks are visible to the naked eye... what on earth have you guys been doing?
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: And this is after you were able to evade some blows, it looks like... Otherwise, the shield would have already shattered, by the looks of the bite marks.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: So what do you plan to do with it once you get a new one?
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Retired equipment is typically sent to storage, either to be used in training or dismantled into parts that can be reused.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Those with special significance are stored separately, or returned to their owners.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: This shield was forged by the smiths of House Silverash, passed down to me from my grandfather to my father, both bodyguards to the family.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: It's a symbol of our vow to give our lives in battle, a vow I took when I received it from my father.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: It's also a symbol of my duty to protect Lady Ensia, as commanded by my lord.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: That's why I really appreciate the efforts you've put towards repairing it.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: But I fear there's been too much damage this time.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Perhaps it would be better to clean it up and keep it for remembrance, while we craft a new shield for battle.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Making a new one is easy. We have the materials, the knowhow, and I have experience fixing your shield.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: But I want to ask you a question.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: If it could be fixed, and not just as good as new, but even better, would you rather have it as a keepsake, or continue to use it?
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Stop worrying about the how.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: You came here and told me the story behind it, what it means to you.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I can tell you care a lot about it.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Caring won't fix a broken shield.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: You haven't even asked if I could fix it.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: ...That's impossible.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: I never said that.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Think it over. About what to give up on, and what to keep. Then you make your decision.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: That's what a lot of operators do when they come to me.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Let's talk, Matterhorn.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I spoke to a girl by the name of Rockrock. Do you know her? She's from Victoria, and she's only been here at HQ a few times, but she left a deep impression on me.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: No... Why do you bring her up?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: She's an interesting girl. A little like myself.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: She was born in an old industrial district, and she feels strongly about everything there. She made everything on her herself.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: She liked my machines, but she insists on only using things she's made with her own hands.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: ...Like how you light the furnace and beat iron into ingots every day?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Exactly.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Is there any point to it? Not really.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: The machines here can create ingots faster than I can. Rockrock understands that what she makes isn't necessarily better than what's available on the market.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: But you both insist on doing it anyway...
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Yes, because there's meaning behind it. It's part of my roots as a blacksmith.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Rockrock insists on using what she made herself because, even though she doesn't reject the new, she feels that her roots are still in that old industrial district.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: As for you, no matter how comfortable you are at Rhodes Island, part of you will always be on the snow-covered mountains of Kjerag. You'll always remember the teachings of your father and grandfather.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I'm asking you, not as a blacksmith but as a friend, to let me continue repairing the shield.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Leave it to me. I'm sure you will be happy with the result.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Vulcan wasn't at the meeting just now, was she? I was working with her a few days ago, but I haven't seen her in the workshop lately.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: She's looking for a new type of metal to repair Matterhorn's shield.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: His shield?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: But wasn't it heavily corroded by poison? I couldn't get that stuff off, no matter how hard I tried.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: I thought he'd give up on it?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: Yes, but I had a chat with him, and apparently Vulcan told him she could fix it.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: Seriously?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: You're new here, so you probably don't know that it used to be just her repairing everyone's weapons before we got more people in the department.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: I even heard that she once forged a legendary weapon, which shook heaven and earth when it left the forge!
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: It made all of Rhodes Island tremble... possibly a little exaggerated, of course, but she definitely lives up to her code name.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: Oh, how I want to bear witness to her work...
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: Is she in the workshop? Can I go watch after I finish my work?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: Nope, she went out to hunt for ore after assigning my duties.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: She's probably digging around in a cave somewhere.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator A

attributes.content: Careful, girl! A big monster lives in that hole. No one dares get close to it.
attributes.name: Villager's Voice

attributes.content: Trust me, plenty of folks have come looking for gold or treasure, but very few have returned.
attributes.name: Villager's Voice

attributes.content: And with a leg like that! You're walking into a death trap.
attributes.name: Villager's Voice

attributes.content: Just keep your distance, sir.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: *sigh* Young folks these days.
attributes.name: Villager's Voice

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Here. Not far from the projected position.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Environment and scale are within projections.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: The terrain may present some difficulties, but the bait and sedative are ready.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Kjerag steel is forged in a way that makes it stronger in a cold environment. It will take the perfect replacement to repair it.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: A few years ago, I found a small piece of crystal on an Originium slug. It had absorbed the slug's secretions, making it extremely strong.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: The well is about 300m deep. My gear checks out.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: ...I think I got something!
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Good, they're all out cold.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Don't worry, this won't hurt... all I need is some of these crystals...
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Oh no, there's another nest in back!
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Completed deposit and strength testing under different temperatures.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Layering looks like it can work well. Layering steel with materials that have high tensile strength helps keep the weapon together during impact.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I need to think about quenching time and temperature, however.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I tried a partial quenching a couple of days ago, and the metal shattered.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: More precise temperature control is required.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I'll need to remove this shelf to make room in the workshop.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Columbia really does make fine machines.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: ...Let's start.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Highlight composition ratios, oxygen levels...
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Setting temperature and time based on this...
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Adjust the angle... increase temperature... initialize...
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Alright, that's close to maximum!
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: There we go!
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: *cough* A new forging method—
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Test successful.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Vulcan? What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Good morning, Instructor Dobermann.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Can I use the training facilities to test this shield?
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Should I grab a trainee or two to help you out? Practicing with a veteran will do them some good.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Even better, thanks.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Ready, Instructor!
attributes.name: Reserve Operator

attributes.content: That's not enough. Don't hold anything back. Throw everything you have at the shield.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Don't worry about injuring me.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Instructor...?
attributes.name: Reserve Operator

attributes.content: Do it. Vulcan is a lot stronger than you are, and she's forged this shield using a new method.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Yes, ma'am!
attributes.name: Reserve Operator

attributes.content: *pant*... *pant*...
attributes.name: Reserve Operator

attributes.content: Well?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Can I ask you to give it a try yourself, Instructor Dobermann?
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Ready!
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Go!
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Nice shield!
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: C-Closure! Excuse me...
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: What's up?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Did... did Vulcan really make a weapon that made Rhodes Island tremble?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator B

attributes.content: Who told you that?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Two weeks later...
Whew—
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: All done.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: And right on schedule.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: There's time for one more round of tests before the deadline.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Excuse me, Vulcan, are you there?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Come in, please.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I've fixed your shield.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Sorry, Vulcan, I didn't think you would actually pull it off...
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Try it.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: It... it really is my shield!
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: You really made it good as new!
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Yes. I used a new forging method, and found a mineral with the right tensile strength to supplement the steel.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: It's not quite as cold-resistant as the original, but the layered structure allows it to maintain adequate strength even in extreme conditions.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: It's every bit as strong as it was. I didn't do anything with the shape, but I've added some Originium circuits in the back. They're automatically triggered and don't require the user to be skilled with Arts.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Don't test it here, though; do it with the equipment at the training grounds.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I never thought... I didn't think it was possible, but you...
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: In just two weeks?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Two weeks was plenty.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I didn't know... When you went on a field trip a few days ago, I thought it was going to get delayed...
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Thank you so much, Vulcan.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: This is my job, after all.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I do this to help operators fix their weapons, meet their needs, and allow the equipment to perform at its best.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Each person's armament means something different to its owner.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: As a craftsman, I strive to deliver the best results.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: That's all.
attributes.name: Vulcan
